scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Hugh Scott Papers consists of 8 items, 1920-1922, pertaining to his time as a student at the Law School of the University of Virginia. Included are grade reports and letters of recommendation from William Minor Lile, as well as a sheet re the collecting and refunding of students' fees, a draft of a student exercise, and the menu of the First Annual Dinner of the Virginia Reel.
